summary: AO3 - Bruce Banner x Tony Stark
title: AO3 - Bruce Banner x Tony Stark
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2EJye6w

by 44TayLo

“‘What do you want?’ Tony repeated softly.

'I want you.’ His voice was broken by the admission. 'I want you. Even though you were experimented on against your will and it was my fault.’ He sobbed openly, now. He wanted to touch Tony so badly. He wanted to kiss him, hold him, fuck him until neither of them could move and were free to spend the rest of their days intertwined. 'Even though I’ve hurt people, and it’s my fault she’s dead.’ He watched Tony suck in a sharp breath at that, and knew he didn’t need to elaborate. 'Even though he was right and I’m a monster, a demon, a devil, I want you.'”

Tony is injected with a mixture of Extremis and Bruce’s blood, turning him into a gamma mutant. It leaves him with some unexpected powers, and leaves Bruce with even more unexpected guilt.

Words: 6220, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, The Avengers - Ambiguous Fandom
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bruce Banner, Tony Stark
  • Relationships: Bruce Banner/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Sexual Roleplay, Gamma Mutant Tony Stark, Wax, Light Bondage, Catholic Guilt, Oral Sex, Mutual Masturbation, Porn With Plot, Emotional Sex, Anal Sex

blog.name: paulandjennifer-italia
blog.title: Paul Bettany and Jennifer Connelly_ Italia
blog.description:
fanblog dedicated to Paul Bettany and Jennifer Connelly 
Instagram 
https://www.instagram.com/paulandjennifer_italia/?hl=it

summary: When I starred with my husband in A beautiful mind and Creation, I felt at home. Our level of intimacy, almost 14 years of life...
body:
When I starred with my husband in A beautiful mind and Creation, I felt at home. Our level of intimacy, almost 14 years of life together, was especially critical when he directed me to Shelter: the part of a homeless man was so strong that I needed to express the vulnerability that can be expressed only when we completely trust someone. Paul is my best friend, I respect his opinion a lot and often ask him for advice on my roles. And he asks them to me.

- Jennifer Connelly

reblog.comment:

- Jennifer Connelly

- Jennifer Connelly
trail.content:
When I starred with my husband in A beautiful mind and Creation, I felt at home. Our level of intimacy, almost 14 years of life together, was especially critical when he directed me to Shelter: the part of a homeless man was so strong that I needed to express the vulnerability that can be expressed only when we completely trust someone. Paul is my best friend, I respect his opinion a lot and often ask him for advice on my roles. And he asks them to me.

- Jennifer Connelly

summary: Monster
title: Monster
body:
“Have you ever asked yourself, do monsters make war, or does war make monsters?”

Six

I paced back and forth in my living room as I waited for Rogers to arrive. I’d spent most of the afternoon furiously scrubbing the place clean just to keep my mind from wandering. I hadn’t seen…

Read more…

summary:
doctor strange HIMSELF approves of the casting of benedict cumberbatch and that is the only thing that matters 
(picture taken...
body:
doctor strange HIMSELF approves of the casting of benedict cumberbatch and that is the only thing that matters

(picture taken from gwenpool #3)

[image description: Doctor Strange and Gwenpool are looking down at an excerpt of our world. Light pink swirls surround them. They see a movie theatre with the Doctor Strange movie on the headlines. Doctor Strange sees this and says: “Fascinating. The people and events of our world leave… Footprints in yours. Little recordings, retelling… Benedict Cumberbatch, eh? Sure, I could see that.”]

Peter: (exsists)
Sam: I CANT TAKE THIS! YOU KEEP THIS UP AND THIS FALCONS FLYING THE COOP! THIS IS...
body:
Bucky:(metal whirling sounds)


Peter: (exsists)


Sam: I CANT TAKE THIS! YOU KEEP THIS UP AND THIS FALCONS FLYING THE COOP! THIS IS RIDICULOUS.


Clint (falls from vents yelling): CAW CAAAAAAAWWWWW *thud* caw.


Everyone: ….


Peter: mood. (Yeets out the window)


*eagle screeches in the distance*


Bucky: StEvE!?? (Looks aroud frantically)


Sam: I need to go to therapy again…
